!Guard Harlan: Hello, stranger! My wife just recently gave birth to a beautiful baby girl! The countless amusements of fatherhood fill me with indescribable joy... I just want to play peek-a-boo all day! I don't care if people laugh... I would do anything for my precious baby! I need a favor, but you are not yet skilled enough to do it for me. Please come back to see me later. (This quest may only be undertaken by a character of level 20 or above.)
